writer.name: 迈克尔·康纳利 Michael Connelly

director.name: 艾莉森·埃尔伍德 Alison Ellwood

this_title: The Wonderland Murders and the Secret History of Hollywood
trans_title: 仙境谋杀案与好莱坞秘史
introduction: Follows the horrific event that has captivated the public's attention for almost 50 years, as well as a more comprehensive narrative about Los Angeles, the American dream, and the situations in which justice might or not be effective.
chinese_title: 仙境谋杀案与好莱坞秘史
foreign_title: The Wonderland Murders and the Secret History of Hollywood
